name: RunVim.applescript
summary: AppleScript to launch vim w/in Terminal (Mac OS X)
description:
Script to launch command-line vim w/in Terminal.
For full details & Xcode project, see http://www.fastnlight.com/runvim
Note, must be built w/ Xcode/AppleScript Studio project. Requires InterfaceBuilder .nib bindings & Info.plist.
